title: Full Automation
description: Combine all learned skills to create a complete automated farming system

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Okay Qubit, final test! Let's combine EVERYTHING you've learned - movement, planting, waiting, and harvesting!

preDialogues.name: Qubit
preDialogues.content: So move to farmland, plant, wait, then harvest? All in one script?

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Exactly! And we'll do it MULTIPLE times to collect 5 wheat total. Ready?

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Here's the plan: Move to a farmland, plant(), sleep(11000), harvest(). Then move to the NEXT farmland and repeat!

preDialogues.name: Qubit
preDialogues.content: So basically a pattern? Move, farm, move, farm, move, farm?

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Perfect! That's exactly it. You'll need to repeat this until you've collected 5 wheat. Let's see your coding skills!

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content:
Hint: You can repeat the same commands. Something like:

move_right()
plant()
sleep(11000)
harvest()
move_right()
plant()
sleep(11000)
harvest()

...and so on!

phases.title: Collect 5 Wheat
phases.description: Write and run a script to automate collecting 5 wheat

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Alright, show me what you've got! Write a script that will automatically collect 5 wheat. I'll wait right here!

objectives.description: Write a script with movement, plant, sleep, and harvest
Write a script with movement, plant, sleep, and harvest

postDialogues.name: Qubit
postDialogues.content: Done! Look at that wheat counter go up!

postDialogues.name: Maru
postDialogues.content: Incredible! You just wrote your first real automation script! No manual clicking, just pure code!

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: You know what this means, right? You're not just a farmer anymore - you're a PROGRAMMER!

preDialogues.name: Qubit
preDialogues.content: I have to admit... this is way cooler than I expected. Automation is powerful.

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: And this is just the beginning! There's so much more you can do - loops, functions, arrays, conditions...

preDialogues.name: Qubit
preDialogues.content: Hold on... loops? You mean I could make this even MORE efficient?

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Hehe, now you're thinking like a real programmer! But let's master the basics first. Grandpa will be so proud!

preDialogues.name: Qubit
preDialogues.content: Thanks for teaching me all this, Maru. I couldn't have done it without you.

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Anytime! Now go explore - there's a whole farm out there waiting to be automated!
